name: The Beach Villas at Kahalu'u

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This condo was the best place I have ever stayed on vacation. The condo was gigantic, the view was amazing, and it had all of the amenities. There were boogie boards, beach towels, a cooler, snorkel gear, water shoes, and a fantastic lanai. We stayed in Unit 1-103, a 3 bedroom, 2 bath unit. It was beautifully furnished and had great showers, comfy couches, and a huge king sized bed in the master bedroom.
reviews.title: WOW! Fantastic Place to Relax!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was amazing to walk across the street and be able to jump into the water with tropical fish and friendly sea turtles. The park gets full during the day, so it was great to be able to just walk across the street first thing in the morning and beat the crowds.
reviews.title: Perfect location/lovely condo unit

likes.liked: — new, beautifully decorated, gorgeous view w/ lots to see on the beach
likes.disliked: — a little noise from road traffic at night if windows/doors left open

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even though we were on the first floor, it felt very safe and we always left the doors and windows open at night. We never had to use the airconditioner because there was always a nice breeze at night. We highly recommend this place and will be coming back next year!
reviews.title: Wonderful Location
I want to go back!
reviews.text: Newer, beautifully decorated condo unit in a perfect location. Ideal for families w/ children as the grounds are very secure, the pool is great for small children with large wading end. The public beach across the street has fantastic snorkeling--lots of fish and turtles.

aka: The Beach Villas At Kahalu`u Hotel
description: The Beach Villas represent the first new beach front condo constructed on Alii Drive in the last 20 years. These villas are large, luxurious, designer decorated and have all the amenities you desire - infinity pool, spa, gas barbecue, central air conditioning, plasma TV, Bose surround sound, and free long distance telephone service to name a few. If you are looking for access to the beach with all the modern conveniences of home, look no further. You have found the ultimate vacation destination!!!
